reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We began our Elbe River cruise with 3 days at the Concorde in Berlin. There were no disappointments. The hotel is worthy of 4 to 5 stars. It's location is not the most convenient for the tourist sights but is very close to the Underground station. Then rooms are clean and well appointed The staff is polite and well trained. The breakfast is awesome. What more can we say? A bit pricey, but so is all of Berlin. We would probably not stay again but only because of the location.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we had a wonderfull stay at the Concorde. Friendly staff and an impressive design. Had dinner at the restaurant and really liked it there. The food has a french twist.
reviews.title: A Real Gem

reviews.text: I have stayed in this hotel for 2 nights and the service was excellent. The location is perfect with easy access in any point of the city. Very spacius room with a nice wooden interior and a touch of modern design. I was impressed by the huge bathroom. The room and of course all the hotel was very clean. Breakfast is also excellent for european standards. Next time I will be in Berlin i say there.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: If you're still browsing reviews to make your decision, look no more.
reviews.title: Best 4 stars hotel in Berlin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very good location, excellent service, parking available. Clean and modern.
reviews.title: Great hotel - great service

likes.liked: — modern spacious rooms and public areas

reviews.text: The whole staff, from Maid to Manager, deserves an award. Everybody shows helpful, respectful attitude. Multilingual.
reviews.title: Modern, clean, great service

reviews.text: Concierge recommended the hotel restaurant but since we wanted to do some walk, he mentioned a place for diner, 6 blocks away, off the touristic circuit: Die Eselin von A. Good choice! Loved the Wiener schnitzel with white asparagus.
reviews.title: Unbeatable Service at this modern hotel

description: The hotel with its 311 spacious rooms and suites is a luxury hotel of the new generation. The magnificent 17-storeyed building, located at legendary “Kurfürstendamm” in Berlin, was designed by the award-winning architect Jan Kleihues. Subtle elegance combined with French flair is being appreciated by business people as well as tourists.
